point.label: String Index
point.description: Index of the string within the bank.

point.label: Module Count
point.description: Number of modules in this string.

point.label: Connected Module Count
point.description: Number of electrically connected modules in this string.

point.label: Max Module Voltage
point.description: Maximum voltage for all modules in the string.

point.label: Max Module Voltage Module
point.description: Module with the maximum voltage.

point.label: Min Module Voltage
point.description: Minimum voltage for all modules in the string.

point.label: Min Module Voltage Module
point.description: Module with the minimum voltage.

point.label: Average Module Voltage
point.description: Average voltage for all modules in the string.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage
point.description: Maximum voltage for all cells in the string.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage Module
point.description: Module containing the cell with the maximum voltage.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage Stack
point.description: Stack containing the cell with the maximum voltage.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage
point.description: Minimum voltage for all cells in the string.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage Module
point.description: Module containing the cell with the minimum voltage.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage Stack
point.description: Stack containing the cell with the minimum voltage.

point.label: Average Cell Voltage
point.description: Average voltage for all cells in the string.

point.label: Max Temperature
point.description: Maximum electrolyte temperature for all modules in the string.

point.label: Max Temperature Module
point.description: Module with the maximum temperature.

point.label: Min Temperature
point.description: Minimum electrolyte temperature for all modules in the string.

point.label: Min Temperature Module
point.description: Module with the minimum temperature.

point.label: Average Temperature
point.description: Average electrolyte temperature for all modules in the string.

point.label: String Event 1
point.description: Alarms, warnings and status values. Bit flags.

symbol.label: Communication Error
symbol.description: BMS is unable to communicate with modules.

symbol.label: Over Temperature Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string has exceeded maximum operating temperature

symbol.label: Over Temperature Warning
symbol.description: Battery string is approaching maximum operating temperature.

symbol.label: Under Temperature Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string has exceeded minimum operating temperature

symbol.label: Under Temperature Warning
symbol.description: Battery string is approaching minimum operating temperature.

symbol.label: Over Charge Current Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string maximum charge current has been exceeded.

symbol.label: Over Charge Current Warning
symbol.description: Approaching battery string maximum charge current.

symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string maximum discharge current has been exceeded.

symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Warning
symbol.description: Approaching battery string maximum discharge current.

symbol.label: Over Voltage Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string voltage has exceeded maximum limit.

symbol.label: Over Voltage Warning
symbol.description: Battery string voltage is approaching maximum limit.

symbol.label: Under Voltage Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string voltage has exceeded minimum limit.

symbol.label: Under Voltage Warning
symbol.description: Battery string voltage is approaching minimum limit.

symbol.label: Under State of Charge Minimum Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMin.

symbol.label: Under State of Charge Minimum Warning
symbol.description: Battery string state of charge is approaching SoCMin.

symbol.label: Over State of Charge Maximum Alarm
symbol.description: Battery string state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMax.

symbol.label: Over State of Charge Maximum Warning
symbol.description: Battery string state of charge is approaching SoCMax

symbol.label: Voltage Imbalance Warning
symbol.description: A voltage imbalance exists between the modules in the string.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Contactor Error
symbol.description: A contactor failed to open or close as requested.

symbol.label: Fan Error
symbol.description: One or more battery string fans has failed.

symbol.label: Ground Fault Error
symbol.description: Ground fault detected.

symbol.label: Open Door Error
symbol.description: One or more doors are open.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Other String Alarm
symbol.description: A vendor specific alarm has occurred.
symbol.notes: See EvtVnd1 and EvtVnd2 for more information.

symbol.label: Other String Warning
symbol.description: A vendor specific warning has occurred.
symbol.notes: See EvtVnd1 and EvtVnd2 for more information.

symbol.label: Fire Alarm
symbol.description: A fire has been detected.

symbol.label: Configuation Alarm
symbol.description: The battery string has been configured incorrectly and will not operate.

symbol.label: Configuation Warning
symbol.description: The battery string has been configured incorrectly and may not operate as expected.

point.label: String Event 2
point.description: Alarms, warnings and status values. Bit flags.

symbol.label: Leak Alarm
symbol.description: A leak has been detected.

symbol.label: Pump Alarm
symbol.description: A pump has experienced an alarm condition or some other error.

symbol.label: High Pressure Alarm
symbol.description: Pressure exceeds maximum value.

symbol.label: High Pressure Warning
symbol.description: Pressure approaching maximum value.

symbol.label: Low Flow Alarm
symbol.description: Flow exceeds minimum value.

symbol.label: Low Flow Warning
symbol.description: Flow approaching minimum value.

point.label: Vendor Event Bitfield 1
point.description: Vendor defined events.

point.label: Vendor Event Bitfield 1
point.description: Vendor defined events.
Scale factor for voltage.
Scale factor for temperature.
Scale factor for state of charge.
Scale factor for open circuit voltage.

point.label: Pad
point.description: Pad register.

point.label: Module Index
point.description: Index of the module within the string.

point.label: Stack Count
point.description: Number of stacks in this module.

point.label: Module Status
point.description: Current status of the module.

symbol.label: Module Is Enabled
symbol.description: Module is enabled and will connect next time battery is asked to connect.

symbol.label: Contactor Status
symbol.description: Module contactor is closed.
symbol.notes: If module has multiple contactors, indicates that all contactors are closed.

point.label: Module State of Charge
point.description: State of charge for this module.

point.label: Open Circuit Voltage
point.description: Open circuit voltage for this module.

point.label: External Voltage
point.description: External voltage fo this module.

point.label: Maximum Cell Voltage
point.description: Maximum voltage for all cells in this module.

point.label: Max Cell Voltage Cell
point.description: Cell with the maximum cell voltage.

point.label: Minimum Cell Voltage
point.description: Minimum voltage for all cells in this module.

point.label: Min Cell Voltage Cell
point.description: Cell with the minimum cell voltage.

point.label: Average Cell Voltage
point.description: Average voltage for all cells in this module.

point.label: Module Event 1
point.description: Alarms, warnings and status values. Bit flags.

symbol.label: Communication Error
symbol.description: Module is unable to communicate with the BMS or other components.

symbol.label: Over Temperature Alarm
symbol.description: Module has exceeded maximum operating temperature

symbol.label: Over Temperature Warning
symbol.description: Module is approaching maximum operating temperature.

symbol.label: Under Temperature Alarm
symbol.description: Module has exceeded minimum operating temperature

symbol.label: Under Temperature Warning
symbol.description: Module is approaching minimum operating temperature.

symbol.label: Over Charge Current Alarm
symbol.description: Module maximum charge current has been exceeded.

symbol.label: Over Charge Current Warning
symbol.description: Approaching module maximum charge current.

symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Alarm
symbol.description: Module maximum discharge current has been exceeded.

symbol.label: Over Discharge Current Warning
symbol.description: Approaching module maximum discharge current.

symbol.label: Over Voltage Alarm
symbol.description: Module voltage has exceeded maximum limit.

symbol.label: Over Voltage Warning
symbol.description: Module voltage is approaching maximum limit.

symbol.label: Under Voltage Alarm
symbol.description: Module voltage has exceeded minimum limit.

symbol.label: Under Voltage Warning
symbol.description: Module voltage is approaching minimum limit.

symbol.label: Under State of Charge Minimum Alarm
symbol.description: Module state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMin.

symbol.label: Under State of Charge Minimum Warning
symbol.description: Module state of charge is approaching SoCMin.

symbol.label: Over State of Charge Maximum Alarm
symbol.description: Module state of charge has reached or exceeded SoCMax.

symbol.label: Over State of Charge Maximum Warning
symbol.description: Module state of charge is approaching SoCMax.

symbol.label: Voltage Imbalance Warning
symbol.description: A voltage imbalance exists between the stacks in the module.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Contactor Error
symbol.description: A contactor failed to open or close as requested.

symbol.label: Fan Error
symbol.description: One or more module fans has failed.

symbol.label: Ground Fault Error
symbol.description: Ground fault detected.

symbol.label: Open Door Error
symbol.description: One or more doors are open.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Reserved
symbol.description: Reserved bit.

symbol.label: Fire Alarm
symbol.description: A fire has been detected.

symbol.label: Configuation Alarm
symbol.description: The battery module has been configured incorrectly and will not operate.

symbol.label: Configuation Warning
symbol.description: The battery module has been configured incorrectly and may not operate as expected.

point.label: Module Event 2
point.description: Alarms, warnings and status values. Bit flags.

symbol.label: Leak Alarm
symbol.description: A leak has been detected.

symbol.label: Pump Alarm
symbol.description: A pump has experienced an alarm condition or some other error.

symbol.label: High Pressure Alarm
symbol.description: Pressure exceeds maximum value.

symbol.label: High Pressure Warning
symbol.description: Pressure approaching maximum value.

symbol.label: Low Flow Alarm
symbol.description: Flow exceeds minimum value.

symbol.label: Low Flow Warning
symbol.description: Flow approaching minimum value.

symbol.label: No Failure
symbol.description: Connect did not fail.

symbol.label: Button Pushed
symbol.description: A button was pushed which prevented connection.

symbol.label: Ground Fault
symbol.description: Ground fault during auto-connect.

symbol.label: Outside Voltage Range
symbol.description: Outside voltage target window during auto-connect.

symbol.label: Module Not Enabled
symbol.description: The module is not enabled.

symbol.label: Fuse Open
symbol.description: A fuse is open which prevents connection.

symbol.label: Contactor Failure
symbol.description: A contactor failed to operate.

symbol.label: Precharge Failure
symbol.description: A failure during precharge occurred.

symbol.label: Module Fault
symbol.description: A module fault has occurred.
symbol.notes: See ModEvt1 and ModEvt2 for more information.

point.label: Enable/Disable Module
point.description: Enables and disables the module.

symbol.label: Enable Module
symbol.description: Enable the module.

symbol.label: Disable Module
symbol.description: Disable the module.

point.label: Connect/Disconnect Module
point.description: Connects and disconnects the module.

symbol.label: Connect Module
symbol.description: Connect the module.

symbol.label: Disconnect Module
symbol.description: Disconnect the module.

point.label: Disabled Reason
point.description: Reason why the module is currently disabled.

symbol.label: No Reason
symbol.description: No reason provided.

symbol.label: Fault
symbol.description: A fault has occurred which caused the module to be disabled.

symbol.label: Maintenance
symbol.description: The module has been disabled for maintenance reasons.

symbol.label: External
symbol.description: The module has been disabled by an external user or controller.

symbol.label: Other
symbol.description: The module has been disabled for some other reason.
